The '''Upside-Down City''' ''(unofficial name)'' is a point of interest in [[Nameless Ruins]], [[The Chasm: Underground Mines]]. This location is initially blocked off by a barrier, which will be removed during the [[Requiem of the Echoing Depths]] [[Archon Quest]].
